name.ja: PicHound - プロの画像アシスタント
name.th: PicHound - ผู้ช่วยภาพมืออาชีพ
name.vi: PicHound - Trợ lý hình ảnh chuyên nghiệp
name.zh_CN: PicHound - 专业图片全能助手，批量下载、同步、轻松收集管理。
name.zh_TW: PicHound - 專業圖片全能助手，批量下載、同步、輕鬆收集管理。

short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,e: PicHound allows you to easily find and manage images on websites
short.bg: PicHound ви позволява лесно да намерите и управлявате изображения на уебсайтове
short.da: PicHound giver dig mulighed for nemt at finde og administrere billeder på websteder
short.de: PicHound ermöglicht es Ihnen, Bilder auf Websites einfach zu finden und zu verwalten
short.el: Το PicHound σας επιτρέπει να βρίσκετε και να διαχειρίζεστε εύκολα εικόνες σε ιστότοπους
short.fa: PicHound به شما امکان می دهد به راحتی تصاویر را در وب سایت ها پیدا و مدیریت کنید
short.fi: PicHound avulla voit helposti löytää ja hallita kuvia verkkosivustoilla
short.fil: Ang PicHound ay nagbibigay-daan sa iyo na madaling makahanap at pamahalaan ang mga imahe sa mga website
short.id: PicHound memungkinkan Anda dengan mudah menemukan dan mengelola gambar di situs web
short.ja: PicHoundを使用すると、Webサイト上の画像を簡単に検索して管理できます
short.ko: PicHound를 사용하면 웹 사이트에서 이미지를 쉽게 찾고 관리할 수 있습니다.
short.lv: PicHound ļauj viegli atrast un pārvaldīt attēlus tīmekļa vietnēs
short.ml: PicHound വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിൽ ചിത്രങ്ങൾ എളുപ്പത്തിൽ കണ്ടെത്താൻ കഴിയും
short.mr: PicHound आपल्याला वेबसाइटवरील छायाचित्रे आसानीने शोधून व्यवस्थित करण्याची परवानगी देते
short.ms: PicHound membolehkan anda dengan mudah mencari dan menguruskan gambar di laman web
short.no: PicHound lar deg enkelt finne og administrere bilder på nettsteder
short.ru: PicHound позволяет легко находить и управлять изображениями на веб-сайтах
short.sv: PicHound låter dig enkelt hitta och hantera bilder på webbplatser
short.th: PicHound ช่วยให้คุณค้นหาและจัดการภาพในเว็บไซต์ได้อย่างง่ายดาย
short.tr: PicHound, web sitelerindeki resimleri kolayca bulmanıza ve yönetmenize olanak tanır
short.vi: PicHound cho phép bạn dễ dàng tìm kiếm và quản lý hình ảnh trên các trang web
short.zh_CN: PicHound允许你轻松查找和管理网站上的图片。
short.zh_TW: PicHound可讓您輕鬆查找和管理網站上的圖像

long.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,:
📸 Powerful Management Plugin: Effortlessly Manage and Edit Abundant Images! 🌟

Update:
August 25, 2024: Add custom intelligent grouping, according to different pictures of different sites for direct classification, built-in part of the e-commerce platform.
August 11, 2024: Add dark mode, support custom theme colors, support extract image colors and support AVIF format conversion.
August 04, 2024: Added the image conversion function, support JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP, SVG and other formats conversion.

If you find yourself frequently dealing with a large number of images, this plugin is undoubtedly your best choice. Let's dive into its amazing features together! ✨

🌿 Batch Download and Filtering: Effortlessly Manage a Vast Amount of Images!
Handling a large quantity of images can be a daunting task, but PicHound is here to solve that challenge for you. It offers a one-click batch download and filtering feature, allowing you to quickly find the desired content within a vast collection of images. Whether you're gathering resources, organizing albums, or managing projects, PicHound provides immense convenience and boosts efficiency! 💪

🔍 Quick Open and Edit Images: Efficiency Improvement Is No Longer a Problem!
Have you ever encountered a situation where you wanted to make secondary edits to one of the images you were browsing through? The traditional approach would involve the cumbersome process of downloading and using external editing tools. However, PicHound simplifies this process significantly. Just click on the image within the platform, and you can swiftly open and make secondary edits, saving you both time and effort! Say goodbye to efficiency concerns! 💡

✨ Image Search by Image: Finding Similar Images Made Easy
If you frequently find yourself puzzled by an unknown image, this feature is undoubtedly your savior! 🌟 Whether you're shopping and want to find a similar product or you're captivated by a beautiful scenery during your travels, simply capture or upload the image, and PicHound will swiftly help you discover similar images. ✨

🔥 Built-in Window Layout: Bid Farewell to Tedious Operations for Easier Management!
In the past, managing images often involved switching between tabs, which was quite laborious. However, PicHound stands out by incorporating a built-in window layout, eliminating the need to open additional tabs for management. With its user-friendly and intuitive interface, you can effortlessly access and edit your images, saving time and enhancing work efficiency. Whether you're a photographer, designer, or any professional handling images, this feature will leave you enamored! 🖼️

PicHound is continuously developing and introducing more practical features. If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to reach out to us. We eagerly anticipate your feedback as we work together to create a more refined plugin! 📢

Please note that PicHound currently supports Chrome versions 114 and above, and it may not be compatible with other browsers.
long.bg,ca,cs,da,de,fa,fi,fil,fr,hr,lv,ml,mr,:
PicHound is a powerful and easy-to-use Google Chrome add-on that allows users to quickly and easily manage and work with a large number of images through a WYSIWYG approach.

Suitable usage scenarios:

E-commerce marketing: product categorization level relocation.
Advertisers and marketers: advertisers and marketers can use Hunting Pictures to manage their branding and promotional images. They can quickly find the images they need, edit and adjust them, and then export them to various advertising and media platforms.
Designers: Designers can use Huntoo to manage their library of design resources, including images, vector graphics, icons, and more.
Content Creators: Content creators can use Huntoo to manage their blogs, articles, presentations and video images. They can easily find and select images that fit their content, as well as edit and beautify them.

Functionality Features:
- Built-in window layout
- Fast image collection and search
- Customize multiple tabs

PicHound is a very useful image batch management tool that not only helps users save time and effort, but also improves efficiency and accuracy. If you often need to deal with a large number of images, then this plugin will definitely benefit you.

The plugin is currently under active development, contact me with any questions and suggestions.

Note: This extension only supports Chrome 114 and above and may not support other browsers.

long.zh_CN:
📸 强大图片管理插件：快速轻松管理和编辑大量图片！ 🌟

一款令人惊喜的图片管理插件——PicHound！如果你是一个经常需要处理大量图片的人，这款插件绝对是你的最佳选择。让我们一起来看看它的酷炫功能吧！✨

更新：
2024年08月25日：增加自定义智能分组，根据不同的站点的不同图片进行直接分类，内置部分电商平台。
2024年08月11日：增加黑暗模式，支持自定义主题颜色，支持提取图片颜色主色调，支持AVIF格式转换。
2024年08月04日：增加了图片转换功能，支持JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP, SVG多种格式的转换。

🔥 窗口布局内置：告别繁琐操作，管理更方便！
以往，我们在管理图片时需要频繁切换标签页，十分繁琐。而PicHound与众不同之处就在于它内置了窗口布局，让你不需要再额外打开新标签页进行管理。通过简单直观的界面，你可以轻松访问和编辑你的图片，节约时间，提高工作效率。无论你是一个摄影师、设计师，还是任何需要处理图片的工作者，这个功能都会让你爱不释手！🖼️

🌿 批量下载和过滤：轻松管理海量图片！
处理大量图片是一项令人头疼的任务，而PicHound将为你解决这个难题。它提供了一键批量图片下载和过滤的功能，让你在海量图片中迅速找到所需的内容。无论是在收集素材、整理相册，还是进行项目管理，PicHound都会给你带来极大的方便和效率提升！💪

🔍 快速打开并编辑图片：提升效率再也不是问题！
曾经遇到这样的情况吗？你在翻看一堆图片时，突然想要对其中一个进行二次编辑。传统的方式是繁琐的下载并使用外部编辑工具，但是PicHound让这一过程变得非常简便。你只需在站内点击图片，就能快速打开并进行二次编辑，而且还能轻松保存！再也不用担心效率问题了！💡

✨ 以图搜图查找相似图片功能
如果你经常遇到不知道某张图片是什么的困扰，那么这个功能绝对是你的救星！🌟无论是在购物中遇到想要找同款的商品，还是在旅行中被一幅美丽的风景吸引，只要通过拍摄或上传图片，Pichound 就能帮你迅速找到与之相似的图片。✨

投入开发中的PicHound将持续推出更多实用功能，如果你有任何问题和建议，欢迎与我们联系。我们期待你的反馈，共同打造一款更加完善的插件！📢

请记住，PicHound目前仅支持Chrome 114及以上版本，可能不支持其他浏览器。如果你是Chrome用户，不要犹豫了！赶快安装这个强大又方便的插件，让图片管理变得超级简单！🚀
